articles.title: Daughter criticises Australia cruise operator after mother dies on island - BBC
articles.description: Katherine Rees said her mum, 80, had fallen ill during a hike on a remote Australian island and was told to return to the ship by herself.
articles.content:
Suzanne Rees was found dead hours after her cruise boat left Lizard Island
The daughter of a woman who was left behind by a cruise ship on a remote island and later died has accused the operator of … [+3012 chars]
